messages.text:
Hello! I'm Video Agent, a helpful AI assistant from HeyGen. I can help you create a video.

Here is a plan for your nature documentary video:

Topic	Nature documentary
Audience	General audience
Music Theme	Calming and instrumental
Video Length	Approximately 15 seconds
Video Orientation	Portrait
Script Plan	The script will be automatically generated based on the topic.
Target Language	English (United States)
Avatar	A male narrator with a professional and engaging presence.
Voice	A calm, adult male voice.
Supplemental Footage (B-roll)	Stock media featuring beautiful nature scenes.
Captions	Enabled

Would you like to proceed with this plan? Type Yes to continue with this plan.

You've reached the limit for Video Agent. To keep creating, you can add Generative Credits or switch to Unlimited Mode. Unlimited Mode only utilizes stock HeyGen Public Avatars and media from the HeyGen library.

The video generation failed because the plan exceeded your plan's limits. I have modified the plan to make it compliant with the Unlimited Plan rules.

Here is the modified plan:

Topic	Nature documentary
Audience	General audience
Music Theme	Calming and instrumental
Video Length	Approximately 15 seconds
Video Orientation	Portrait
Script Plan	The script will be automatically generated based on the topic.
Target Language	English (United States)
Avatar	generic male avatar
Voice	generic male voice
Supplemental Footage (B-roll)	Stock media featuring beautiful nature scenes.
Captions	Enabled

I changed the Avatar from 'A male narrator with a professional and engaging presence' to 'generic male avatar' and the Voice from 'A calm, adult male voice' to 'generic male voice'. The Unlimited Plan only allows for generic avatars and voices. Does this modified plan look good to you, yes or no?
Great! Your video has been generated. Let me know if you'd like to make any changes.
